LanguageData.RE_MassEffectFieldManipulation.label: mass effect field manipulation
LanguageData.RE_MassEffectFieldManipulation.descripti: Use zero element to open new scientific horizons.

LanguageData.RE_PrefabGeothermalPlant.label: prefab geothermal plant

LanguageData.RE_AmmunitionModification.description: Produce new ammo types with different attributes.

LanguageData.RE_FusionReactor.description: Construct fusion reactors and cells for electricity generation.
LanguageData.RE_ElementZero.label: element zero

LanguageData.RE_EezoPowerGeneration.label: eezo power generation
LanguageData.RE_EezoPowerGeneration.description: Construct element zero reactor to produce huge amounts of electricity.

LanguageData.RE_BioticAmp.description: Craft biotic amps in order to receive biotic abilities.

LanguageData.RE_OmniTool.description: Craft omni-tools in order to receive tech powers.
LanguageData.RE_MediGelFabrication.label: medi-gel fabrication
LanguageData.RE_MediGelFabrication.description: Produce medi-gel by using element zero.

LanguageData.RE_HighTechBodyImplants.description: Make high-tech body implants with unique purposes.

LanguageData.RE_AllianceCooperation.description: Use alliance terminal in order to get access to new research projects.
